name: SimCity 2000: Special Edition
description: Will use the Windows installer from GOG.com. This installer will change the DOSBox settings to have the best available performance. The installer will also create the sim city configuration for you so sound and music will work out of the box.

files.installer:
N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file. Download it here: 
https://www.gog.com/downloads/simcity_2000_special_edition/en1installer0

write_file.content:
[ipx] ipx=false
[autoexec]
mount c .
c:
imgmount d SC2000SE.DAT -t iso -fs iso
LOADFIX -1 SC2K %1
exit

content:
files:
- installer: "N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file. Download it here: \nhttps://www.gog.com/downloads/simcity_2000_special_edition/en1installer0\n"
- fileextract: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
  game_id: simcity-2000-special-edition
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000_single.conf
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting innoextract application
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $fileextract
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE/game" "$installer"
    description: Extracting game data
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/game
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosboxSC2000.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
    key: fulldouble
    section: sdl
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: desktop
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000.conf
    key: scaler
    section: render
    value: normal2x
- write_file:
    content: '[ipx] ipx=false

      [autoexec]

      mount c .

      c:

      imgmount d SC2000SE.DAT -t iso -fs iso

      LOADFIX -1 SC2K %1

      exit

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC2000_single.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/SC2000.CFG
    key: MUSICNAME
    section: Music
    value: Sound Blaster 16
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/SC2000.CFG
    key: MUSICDRIVER
    section: Music
    value: A32SP2FM.DLL
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/SC2000.CFG
    key: MUSICADDRESS
    section: Music
    value: 220
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/SC2000.CFG
    key: MUSICIRQ
    section: Music
    value: 5
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/SC2000.CFG
    key: MUSICDMA
    section: Music
    value: 1
